title: Duke's family out for a stroll in Brazil
body:
On Thursday Manoel Lemos was returning to his office and saw this
very picturesque scene (click on the picture to see an enlarged
version). He used his camera/java enabled mobile phone and took the
picture and uploaded it with a MIDP application he's developing for
a Mobile Photo Blog. When I saw the picture, I almost fell out of
my chair laughing. The similarity is completely accidental. It is a
picture of a bunch of "bean bags" being sold in the streets by
local mobile merchants. Something very common in Brazil, it is what
they call "Camelôs", or informal nomadic merchants.
